extendedInfo.description: Jump Shot is the hottest platform game on the market! Help your space man to destroy hoards of enemies across hours of addicting climbup, falldown, survival and boss levels while collecting drops from the dead to help you on your journey! Jump Shot features 3 gripping game modes, Campaign, Freeplay, and Survival:Campaign - Campaign mode features 3 campaigns each loaded with 6 climbup levels, 6 falldown levels, and 1 epic boss battle!Freeplay - For those interested in an endless adventure, Freeplay mode allows you to jump on an infinite level in either climbup or falldown with toggleable enemies. How high of a score can you get?Survival - Stand your ground and fight waves of enemies in Survival mode! Each wave adds new and more difficult enemies. How many waves can you beat?As of version 1.1 you can now configure your sensitivity in the options screen!A Premium Version that removes ads is also available. Download Jump Shot today and begin your journey!** Although Airpush is used, ONLY the Smartwall feature is implemented and ABSOLUTELY no ads will be posted in the notification tray or the home screen! **All extra permissions are being used for ads."Jump Shot is an extremely enjoyable game!"    - Ollie Green, NoBrainerAppReviews.com"An excellent app!"     - Editor's Choice from DroidAppOfTheDay.comKW: action climb climbup fall falldown jump platform shooter shot space survival wave score tilt

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: This game is an awesome yet addictive game! The only thing that could make this app even a little better would be if you could customize the sensativity!
reviews.author: Connor Schaum

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Amazing app! Just needs some more support for smaller screens
reviews.author: shm kane

reviews.title: Minor \'bugs\'
reviews.comment: The only things keeping me from 5 stars are: 1. The guy jumps even if his head is the only thing touching the pad. 2. Sensitivity is a bit high; maybe customizable. 3. The excessive ads.get annoying. Especially when the automatically redirect me or pop up twice after.I close the first. Otherwise, great app! I look forward to playing more apps made by Hammel!
reviews.author: Jacob Schaum
